long_description: The medium-size Eagle Creek Tailfeather Waistpack has security features and roomy internal organization to keep everything you need at your fingertips for a day of exploration. Main compartment has lockable zippers to deter pickpockets. Front zippered fleece-lined pocket protects a phone or music player. Inner mesh zip organization pocket and key fob. External zip secondary compartment. 2 mesh side pockets hold water bottles or other quick-grab items. Padded, breathable mesh back panel adds comfort. Adjustable strap and top grab handle. Eagle Creek Tailfeather Waistpack in medium has reflective accents so you're more visible in low light.
short_description: The medium-size Eagle Creek Tailfeather Waistpack has security features and roomy internal organization to keep everything you need at your fingertips for a day of exploration.
